quiz_item.error_analysis: 学生易混淆"confederation"（松散同盟）与形近词"confederate"（同盟者）或近义词"federation"（联邦），误判为更紧密的"联邦"或具体的"同盟者"
quiz_item.sentence: The European Union started as a **confederation** of six countries focused on economic cooperation before evolving into a more integrated union.
